text: Ne zhenites' na mnogobozhnitsakh, poka oni ne uveruyut: konechno, veruyushchaya rabynya luchshe mnogobozhnitsy, khotya by ona i vostorgala vas. I ne vydavayte zamuzh za mnogobozhnikov, poka oni ne uveruyut: konechno, veruyushchiy rab - luchshe mnogobozhnika, khotya by on i vostorgal vas. Eti zovut k ognyu, a Allakh zovet k rayu i proshcheniyu so Svoyego dozvoleniya i raz"yasnyayet Svoi znameniya lyudyam, - mozhet byt', oni opomnyatsya
